user_query: I am looking for information on a specific company. Can you search for the company 'ESK GLOBAL SERVICES LIMITED' and provide me with the registration number, address, and registration date? Also, fetch all the companies in the database.

TaskList.description: Fetch all companies in the database to extract relevant information later.
Search for the company 'ESK GLOBAL SERVICES LIMITED' using its name to retrieve its registration number, address, and registration date.
